system--csf--select--definitions--device.description: The type of Security Fabric device.

system--csf--select--definitions--eos_da.description: UNIX timestamp of when this device reached end of support.

system--csf--select--definitions--fortic.description: This indicates device's FortiCare registration status.

end.description: The ending timestamp of the timeframe, in milliseconds.

start.title: Start Timestamp.
start.description: The starting timestamp of the timeframe, in milliseconds.

min_avg.description: Average of the lowest statistic value recorded.

max_avg.title: Maximum Value Average

items.title: Resource Usage Tuple Value
items.description: Resource usage tuple value.

system--resource--usage--definitions--us.description: Usage statistics for the specified resource.

conflict_with_auto_assigned.title: Conflict with Automatically Assigned IP Address
conflict_with_auto_assigned.description: True when a manually configured IP address conflicts with other automatically assigned IP addresses.

from_dhcp.title: From DHCP
from_dhcp.description: True when an IP address is configured by DHCP server.

entry_outside_of_pool.title: Entry Outside of Pool
entry_outside_of_pool.description: True when the interface uses an IP outside of the IPAM pool.

items.title: Conflicting Entry
items.description: Conflicting entry.

easyApplyOnly.title: Easy Apply Only
easyApplyOnly.description: True when the issue is only visible during easy apply.

items.title: Node Properties
items.description: Details of a topology node.

id.title: Node ID
id.description: ID that uniquely identifies this node.

type.title: Node Type
type.description: Type of node. Used to determine unique rendering or interaction behavior.

sub-topology.title: Nested Topology Schema
sub-topology.description: Schema for sub-topology objects (nodes and edges) inside a node.

interactType.title: Node Interact Types
interactType.description: Interaction types supported by the node. Used to determine client-specific interactions for a node.

iconClass.title: Node Icon Class
iconClass.description: Font icon class for the node. Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

iconColor.title: Hexadecimal Icon Color
iconColor.description: Icon color (hexadecimal). Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

subIconClass.title: Node Icon Class
subIconClass.description: Font icon class for the node's sub-icon. Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

subIconColor.title: Hexadecimal Icon Color
subIconColor.description: Icon color (hexadecimal). Only applicable for 'icon' nodes with sub-icons.

items.title: Icon Group Member
items.description: Details of an icon group member.

iconClass.title: Icon Group Member Icon Class
iconClass.description: Font icon class for the icon group member.

id.title: Icon Group Member ID
id.description: Unique ID of the icon group member. Used to determine unique rendering or interaction behavior.

label.title: Icon Group Member Label
label.description: Label for the icon group member.

type.title: Icon Group Member Type
type.description: Type of the icon group member. Used to determine unique rendering or interaction behavior.

spanningTreeRoot.title: Is Spanning Tree Root
spanningTreeRoot.description: True when the node is the spanning tree root for the topology.

caption.title: Node Caption
caption.description: Localized node caption that should be shown alongside the label.

labelClass.title: Node Label Class
labelClass.description: CSS class for the node label.

alwaysVisible.title: Node Visibility
alwaysVisible.description: True when node visibility is toggleable.

hasLeftBranchToggle.title: Has Left Branch Toggle
hasLeftBranchToggle.description: True when the node's left branch is toggleable. Note: This assumes a left-to-right layout for the topology.

iconBackground.title: Icon Background
iconBackground.description: Icon background for the node. Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

iconBadges.title: Node Icon Badges
iconBadges.description: Icon badges for the node. Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

numberBubbleBadges.title: Number Bubble Badges
numberBubbleBadges.description: Number bubble badges displayed alongside the node.

items.title: Number Bubble Badge Schema
items.description: Details of a number bubble badge.

numberBubble.title: Number Bubble Value
numberBubble.description: Numeric value of the number bubble.

severity.title: Number Bubble Severity
severity.description: Severity state associated with the number bubble.

tooltip.title: Number Bubble Tooltip Text
tooltip.description: Text to be displayed inside a tooltip for the number bubble.

position.title: Number Bubble Position
position.description: The position of the node's number bubble relative to the node's icon.

interactType.title: Number Bubble Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for number bubble.

placement.title: Node Placement
placement.description: Placement of the node. Used to identify leaf vs non-leaf nodes of the topology.

subType.title: Node Subtype
subType.description: Subtype of the node. Used to further categorize 'container' type nodes.

donutLabel.title: Donut Label
donutLabel.description: Only applicable for 'container' type nodes (they are shown as donuts by default).

donutGroupByKey.title: Donut Grouping Key
donutGroupByKey.description: Only applicable for 'container' type nodes. Their member nodes are organized into donut segments according to the value of this key.

donutGroupSumKey.title: Donut Grouping Sum Key
donutGroupSumKey.description: Only applicable for 'container' type nodes. Their member nodes are organized into donut segments according to the value of this key.

tableContent.title: Node Table Contents
tableContent.description: List of node ports, represented as a table, for drawing edge connections between nodes.

items.title: The Items Schema
items.description: Details of the Node Table Content Item.

interactType.title: Table Row Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for the table row.

iconClass.title: Table Row Icon Class
iconClass.description: Icon class for the table row. Usually determined by the corresponding port's type and link state.

id.title: Table Row ID
id.description: Unique ID for the table row. Used for determining client-specific behavior.

label.title: Table Row Label
label.description: Text label for the table row.

labelFontWeight.title: Label Font Weight
labelFontWeight.description: Font weight for the label text.

parentId.title: Parent Table Row ID
parentId.description: ID of the parent table row. Used to determine table row grouping and hierarchy.

indentLevel.title: Table Row Indentation Level
indentLevel.description: Indentation level for the table row. Used to depict parent-child hierarchy between table rows. Only application for table rows with a parentID attribute.

fillColor.title: Table Row Fill Color
fillColor.description: Hexadecimal fill color for the table row.

serialized.title: Serialized Table Row Data
serialized.description: Serialized data for the table row. Contains port or portgroup related information to generate client-side interactions.

serialized.title: Serialized Node Properties
serialized.description: Properties of the serialized node. Used to construct client-side models associated with this node.

anyOf.title: Container Node Contents
anyOf.description: List of member nodes for the container node. Only available in 'container' node types.

items.title: Container Member Schema
items.description: Schema for members of the container node.

interactType.title: Member Node Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for the member node.

type.title: Member Node Type
type.description: Type of member node. Used to determine unique rendering or interaction behavior for the member node.

id.title: Member Node ID
id.description: Unique ID for the member node.

iconClass.title: Member Node Icon Class
iconClass.description: Font icon class for the member node.

iconKey.title: Member Node Icon Key
iconKey.description: Original key used to look up the member node's icon class. This can be used to group similar member nodes.

fillColor.title: Member Node Fill Color
fillColor.description: Hexadecimal color for the member node (only applicable for endpoint nodes).

borderColors.title: Member Node Border Colors
borderColors.description: List of hexadecimal colors applied to the member node's borders.

items.title: Border Color
items.description: Hexadecimal border color.

formattedValue.title: Formatted Value
formattedValue.description: The formatted value (with units) associated with the member node.

value.title: Member Node Value
value.description: The numeric value associated with the member node. Used to determine sorting and size of the node.

iconBadge.title: Member Node Icon Badge
iconBadge.description: Icon badge for the member node. Usually a composite icon with 'main' and 'effect' sub-icons.

main.description: Font icon class for the base icon in the icon badge.

effect.title: Sub-Icon
effect.description: Font icon class for the sub-icon in the icon badge.

color.title: Icon Badge Color
color.description: The color of the effect sub-icon in the badge.

tooltip.title: Icon Badge Tooltip Text
tooltip.description: Text to be displayed inside a tooltip for the icon badge.

placement.title: Icon Badge Placement
placement.description: The location of the edge that icon badge to be displayed at.

count.title: Number of Members
count.description: Number of members in a particular group. Only applicable for multi-group type nodes.

addressType.title: Destination Address Type
addressType.description: Address type of the destination. Only applicable for member nodes that belong to a container with 'destination' interactType.

hostCount.title: Destination Host Count
hostCount.description: Number of destination hosts. Only applicable for member nodes that belong to a container with 'destination' interactType.

serialized.title: Serialized Properties
serialized.description: Serialized properties for the member node. Used to construct client-side models for the member node.

anyOf.title: Destination Container Node Contents
anyOf.description: List of member nodes for the destination container node. Only available in 'container' node types with 'destination-*' interact types.

items.title: Container Member Schema
items.description: Schema for members of the container node.

interactType.title: Member Node Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for the member node.

id.title: Member Node ID
id.description: Unique ID for the member node.

value.title: Member Node Value
value.description: The numeric value associated with the member node. Used to determine sorting and size of the node.

addressType.title: Destination Address Type
addressType.description: Address type of the destination. Only applicable for member nodes that belong to a container with 'destination' interactType.

hostCount.title: Destination Host Count
hostCount.description: Number of destination hosts. Only applicable for member nodes that belong to a container with 'destination' interactType.

serialized.title: Serialized Properties
serialized.description: Serialized properties for the member node. Used to construct client-side models for the member node.

items.title: Multi-Edge Schema
items.description: Details of a topology multi-edge.

properties.description: List of edges belonging to this multi-edge.

items.title: Edge Member Schema
items.description: Details of an edge belonging to a multi-edge.

iconBadge.description: Usually a composite icon with 'main' and 'effect' sub-icons. Typically drawn along the midpoint of the edge.

main.title: Main Icon
main.description: Font icon class for the base icon of the badge.

effect.title: Sub Icon
effect.description: Font icon class for the sub-icon of the badge.

color.description: The color of the effect sub-icon in the badge.

tooltip.title: Icon Badge Tooltip Text
tooltip.description: Text to be displayed inside a tooltip for the icon badge.

interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for the icon badge.

placement.title: Icon Badge Placement
placement.description: The location of the edge that icon badge to be displayed at.

nodeProperties.description: Dictionary map with incident node IDs as keys. The keys point to properties for the edge's incident nodes.

additionalProperties.title: Edge Node Properties
additionalProperties.description: Edge node properties.

tableRowId.title: Edge Node Table Row ID
tableRowId.description: The ID of the table row that the edge is connected to.

intf.title: Edge Node Interface
intf.description: The interface name that the edge is connected to.

color.description: Color applied to the SVG path for this edge.

strokeDasharray.description: Stroke dash array applied to the SVG path for this edge.

strokeWidth.description: Stroke width applied to the SVG path for this edge.

interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for edge.

AUTO_RECOMMENDATION_RESULT.title: Auto Recommendation Result
AUTO_RECOMMENDATION_RESULT.description: Possible results for auto recommendation execution.

EXECUTION_ERROR.title: Execution Error
EXECUTION_ERROR.description: An error occurred while executing auto-recommendation.

SUPPORTED_OBJECT_PARTIALS_LOCATION.title: Supported Object Partials Location
SUPPORTED_OBJECT_PARTIALS_LOCATION.description: Location of the supported object partials.

EXECUTION_ERROR.title: Execution Error
EXECUTION_ERROR.description: Check failed due to an error during execution.

DEPENDENCIES_NOT_MET.title: Dependencies Not Met
DEPENDENCIES_NOT_MET.description: Dependencies not met for a check to run.

EXEMPT.title: Exempt
EXEMPT.description: Check was exempt from this batch of reports.

NOT_LICENSED.title: Not Licensed
NOT_LICENSED.description: Security Rating is not licensed to run this check.

SEVERITY_LEVELS.title: Severity Levels
SEVERITY_LEVELS.description: Possible Severity Levels of Check Failure.

SEVERITY_LEVEL_WEIGHT.title: Severity Level Weight
SEVERITY_LEVEL_WEIGHT.description: Defines the impact of each severity level on the score.

DATA_TYPES.title: Data Types
DATA_TYPES.description: Data types for string interpolation on the GUI.

VALIDATION_TYPES.title: Validation Types
VALIDATION_TYPES.description: Keys for pattern matching and validation.

MATURITY_LEVELS.title: Maturity Levels
MATURITY_LEVELS.description: Structure of a Maturity Level object.

DEVICES.title: Devices
DEVICES.description: Devices that the checks are run for.

detectedEndpointTypes.title: Detected Endpoint Types
detectedEndpointTypes.description: Cumulative numbers for types of endpoints in the topology.

additionalProperties.title: Number of Endpoint Devices
additionalProperties.description: Number of endpoint devices in the topology, by type.

detectedEndpointChange.title: Detected Endpoint Change
detectedEndpointChange.description: Change in number of endpoints in the topology.

_performance.title: Report Performance
_performance.description: List of entries for checking report generation performance.

items.title: Performance Entry
items.description: Details of a report performance entry.

name.title: Entry Name
name.description: Describes the section of code that this entry is measuring performance for.

startTime.title: Entry Start Time
startTime.description: The high resolution millisecond timestamp marking the starting time of the Performance Entry.

duration.title: Entry Elapsed Time
duration.description: The total number of milliseconds elapsed for this entry.

topology.title: Topology Schema
topology.description: Schema for topology objects (nodes and edges).

items.title: Node Properties
items.description: Details of a topology node.

id.title: Node ID
id.description: ID that uniquely identifies this node.

type.title: Node Type
type.description: Type of node. Used to determine unique rendering or interaction behavior.

sub-topology.title: Nested Topology Schema
sub-topology.description: Schema for sub-topology objects (nodes and edges) inside a node.

interactType.title: Node Interact Types
interactType.description: Interaction types supported by the node. Used to determine client-specific interactions for a node.

iconClass.title: Node Icon Class
iconClass.description: Font icon class for the node. Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

iconColor.title: Hexadecimal Icon Color
iconColor.description: Icon color (hexadecimal). Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

subIconClass.title: Node Icon Class
subIconClass.description: Font icon class for the node's sub-icon. Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

subIconColor.title: Hexadecimal Icon Color
subIconColor.description: Icon color (hexadecimal). Only applicable for 'icon' nodes with sub-icons.

items.title: Icon Group Member
items.description: Details of an icon group member.

iconClass.title: Icon Group Member Icon Class
iconClass.description: Font icon class for the icon group member.

id.title: Icon Group Member ID
id.description: Unique ID of the icon group member. Used to determine unique rendering or interaction behavior.

label.title: Icon Group Member Label
label.description: Label for the icon group member.

type.title: Icon Group Member Type
type.description: Type of the icon group member. Used to determine unique rendering or interaction behavior.

spanningTreeRoot.title: Is Spanning Tree Root
spanningTreeRoot.description: True when the node is the spanning tree root for the topology.

caption.title: Node Caption
caption.description: Localized node caption that should be shown alongside the label.

labelClass.title: Node Label Class
labelClass.description: CSS class for the node label.

alwaysVisible.title: Node Visibility
alwaysVisible.description: True when node visibility is toggleable.

hasLeftBranchToggle.title: Has Left Branch Toggle
hasLeftBranchToggle.description: True when the node's left branch is toggleable. Note: This assumes a left-to-right layout for the topology.

iconBackground.title: Icon Background
iconBackground.description: Icon background for the node. Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

iconBadges.title: Node Icon Badges
iconBadges.description: Icon badges for the node. Only applicable for 'icon' node types.

numberBubbleBadges.title: Number Bubble Badges
numberBubbleBadges.description: Number bubble badges displayed alongside the node.

items.title: Number Bubble Badge Schema
items.description: Details of a number bubble badge.

numberBubble.title: Number Bubble Value
numberBubble.description: Numeric value of the number bubble.

severity.title: Number Bubble Severity
severity.description: Severity state associated with the number bubble.

tooltip.title: Number Bubble Tooltip Text
tooltip.description: Text to be displayed inside a tooltip for the number bubble.

position.title: Number Bubble Position
position.description: The position of the node's number bubble relative to the node's icon.

interactType.title: Number Bubble Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for number bubble.

placement.title: Node Placement
placement.description: Placement of the node. Used to identify leaf vs non-leaf nodes of the topology.

subType.title: Node Subtype
subType.description: Subtype of the node. Used to further categorize 'container' type nodes.

donutLabel.title: Donut Label
donutLabel.description: Only applicable for 'container' type nodes (they are shown as donuts by default).

donutGroupByKey.title: Donut Grouping Key
donutGroupByKey.description: Only applicable for 'container' type nodes. Their member nodes are organized into donut segments according to the value of this key.

donutGroupSumKey.title: Donut Grouping Sum Key
donutGroupSumKey.description: Only applicable for 'container' type nodes. Their member nodes are organized into donut segments according to the value of this key.

tableContent.title: Node Table Contents
tableContent.description: List of node ports, represented as a table, for drawing edge connections between nodes.

items.title: The Items Schema
items.description: Details of the Node Table Content Item.

interactType.title: Table Row Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for the table row.

iconClass.title: Table Row Icon Class
iconClass.description: Icon class for the table row. Usually determined by the corresponding port's type and link state.

id.title: Table Row ID
id.description: Unique ID for the table row. Used for determining client-specific behavior.

label.title: Table Row Label
label.description: Text label for the table row.

labelFontWeight.title: Label Font Weight
labelFontWeight.description: Font weight for the label text.

parentId.title: Parent Table Row ID
parentId.description: ID of the parent table row. Used to determine table row grouping and hierarchy.

indentLevel.title: Table Row Indentation Level
indentLevel.description: Indentation level for the table row. Used to depict parent-child hierarchy between table rows. Only application for table rows with a parentID attribute.

fillColor.title: Table Row Fill Color
fillColor.description: Hexadecimal fill color for the table row.

serialized.title: Serialized Table Row Data
serialized.description: Serialized data for the table row. Contains port or portgroup related information to generate client-side interactions.

serialized.title: Serialized Node Properties
serialized.description: Properties of the serialized node. Used to construct client-side models associated with this node.

anyOf.title: Container Node Contents
anyOf.description: List of member nodes for the container node. Only available in 'container' node types.

items.title: Container Member Schema
items.description: Schema for members of the container node.

interactType.title: Member Node Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for the member node.

type.title: Member Node Type
type.description: Type of member node. Used to determine unique rendering or interaction behavior for the member node.

id.title: Member Node ID
id.description: Unique ID for the member node.

iconClass.title: Member Node Icon Class
iconClass.description: Font icon class for the member node.

iconKey.title: Member Node Icon Key
iconKey.description: Original key used to look up the member node's icon class. This can be used to group similar member nodes.

fillColor.title: Member Node Fill Color
fillColor.description: Hexadecimal color for the member node (only applicable for endpoint nodes).

borderColors.title: Member Node Border Colors
borderColors.description: List of hexadecimal colors applied to the member node's borders.

items.title: Border Color
items.description: Hexadecimal border color.

formattedValue.title: Formatted Value
formattedValue.description: The formatted value (with units) associated with the member node.

value.title: Member Node Value
value.description: The numeric value associated with the member node. Used to determine sorting and size of the node.

iconBadge.title: Member Node Icon Badge
iconBadge.description: Icon badge for the member node. Usually a composite icon with 'main' and 'effect' sub-icons.

main.title: Main Icon
main.description: Font icon class for the base icon in the icon badge.

effect.title: Sub-Icon
effect.description: Font icon class for the sub-icon in the icon badge.

color.title: Icon Badge Color
color.description: The color of the effect sub-icon in the badge.

tooltip.title: Icon Badge Tooltip Text
tooltip.description: Text to be displayed inside a tooltip for the icon badge.

placement.title: Icon Badge Placement
placement.description: The location of the edge that icon badge to be displayed at.

count.title: Number of Members
count.description: Number of members in a particular group. Only applicable for multi-group type nodes.

addressType.title: Destination Address Type
addressType.description: Address type of the destination. Only applicable for member nodes that belong to a container with 'destination' interactType.

hostCount.title: Destination Host Count
hostCount.description: Number of destination hosts. Only applicable for member nodes that belong to a container with 'destination' interactType.

serialized.title: Serialized Properties
serialized.description: Serialized properties for the member node. Used to construct client-side models for the member node.

anyOf.title: Destination Container Node Contents
anyOf.description: List of member nodes for the destination container node. Only available in 'container' node types with 'destination-*' interact types.

items.title: Container Member Schema
items.description: Schema for members of the container node.

interactType.title: Member Node Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for the member node.

id.title: Member Node ID
id.description: Unique ID for the member node.

value.title: Member Node Value
value.description: The numeric value associated with the member node. Used to determine sorting and size of the node.

addressType.title: Destination Address Type
addressType.description: Address type of the destination. Only applicable for member nodes that belong to a container with 'destination' interactType.

hostCount.title: Destination Host Count
hostCount.description: Number of destination hosts. Only applicable for member nodes that belong to a container with 'destination' interactType.

serialized.title: Serialized Properties
serialized.description: Serialized properties for the member node. Used to construct client-side models for the member node.

items.title: Multi-Edge Schema
items.description: Details of a topology multi-edge.

properties.title: The Multi-Edge Members Schema
properties.description: List of edges belonging to this multi-edge.

items.title: Edge Member Schema
items.description: Details of an edge belonging to a multi-edge.

iconBadge.title: Edge Icon Badge
iconBadge.description: Usually a composite icon with 'main' and 'effect' sub-icons. Typically drawn along the midpoint of the edge.

main.title: Main Icon
main.description: Font icon class for the base icon of the badge.

effect.title: Sub Icon
effect.description: Font icon class for the sub-icon of the badge.

color.title: Icon Badge Color
color.description: The color of the effect sub-icon in the badge.

tooltip.title: Icon Badge Tooltip Text
tooltip.description: Text to be displayed inside a tooltip for the icon badge.

interactType.title: Icon Badge Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for the icon badge.

placement.title: Icon Badge Placement
placement.description: The location of the edge that icon badge to be displayed at.

nodeProperties.title: Incident Node Properties
nodeProperties.description: Dictionary map with incident node IDs as keys. The keys point to properties for the edge's incident nodes.

additionalProperties.title: Edge Node Properties
additionalProperties.description: Edge node properties.

tableRowId.title: Edge Node Table Row ID
tableRowId.description: The ID of the table row that the edge is connected to.

intf.title: Edge Node Interface
intf.description: The interface name that the edge is connected to.

color.title: Edge Color
color.description: Color applied to the SVG path for this edge.

strokeDasharray.title: Stroke Dash Array
strokeDasharray.description: Stroke dash array applied to the SVG path for this edge.

strokeWidth.title: Stroke Width
strokeWidth.description: Stroke width applied to the SVG path for this edge.

interactType.title: Edge Interact Type
interactType.description: Specifies the client-specific interactions for edge.

items.title: Device Status Summary
items.description: Status summary for a specific device type.

type.title: Device Type
type.description: The device type corresponding to this status summary.

total.title: Total Device Count
total.description: The total number of devices of this type.

auditTime.title: Audit Time
auditTime.description: Time at which this report was executed, in milliseconds elapsed since Jan 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC.

params.title: Report Parameters
params.description: Full list of API parameters (including defaults for missing ones) used to generate this report.

anyOf.description: The total number of milliseconds elapsed for this entry.

scheduledRun.description: True if this is a scheduled run.
